long_description: The women's Sherpani Access LE Daypack organizes an amazing amount of gear, including a tablet or e-reader, in a slim profile. Deep main zippered compartment has pockets to organize credit cards, a phone, pens, etc. Sleeve inside main compartment holds up to a 10 in. tablet or e-reader. Top external fleece-lined pocket holds an electronic device or sunglasses. Front vertically zippered pocket stows a book, maps or other things you want readily accessible. Shoulder straps are padded for comfort. Sherpani Access LE Daypack features silicone-coated ripstop-nylon paneling with embroidered design.
short_description: The women's Sherpani Access LE Daypack organizes an amazing amount of gear, including a tablet or e-reader, in a slim profile.
